feed.title: "The Anatomy Of Melancholy" (1621) by Robert Burton in XeLaTeX
feed.subtitle: A free/libre project to create a new modern edition for 'Anatomy of Melancholy'.

entry.title: Latest draft url
entry.content: The latest published draft can be accessed from the url https://epilys.github.io/anatomy-of-melancholy-latex/aom_latest.pdf
